channel.title: camera on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in camera on Barefoot Rob

item.title: stomach camera
item.description: 9:31 Friday 17 August 2018 JST I just finished having my stomach checked. It was different than I expected. They put some kind of anesthetic in my mouth which for a moment maybe not be able to swallow which was weird. I couldn’t breathe through my mouth. It was a little frightening that I couldn’t breathe through my mouth, but I was able to breathe through my nose so I was able to maintain and calm demeanor.

item.title: Great day at the beach
item.description: 20:58 Sunday 09 July 2017 JST I joined Lin who met her co-workers in Kamakura for a going away party for one of the managers. Aki had a Canon film camera with a short little lens, so I offered to give her the slightly longer lens that came with my Canon EOS.
